Replying to @sebastienlorber 2018-05-02 10:45
@sebastienlorber @Netlify FWIW, I still try be measured in what events I use to trigger builds. For instance, I used fire a build hook to Netlify from @contentful after every content save... which, I discovered, was every keystroke üò≥ A quick tweak in Contentful changed that to fire just on publish. üëå
